token
Class TokenFactory

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--token.TokenFactory
public class TokenFactory
extends java.lang.Object

This class is a token factory for a simple language of expressions. Similar to an iterator, it enumerates all the tokens originating from a string.

Constructor Summary
TokenFactory(java.lang.String source)
          Constructor of the token factory.
 
Method Summary
 Token createToken()
          Create and return the next token of the file.
 boolean hasMoreTokens()
          Tell whether the factory can create more tokens from the file.

Method Detail

hasMoreTokens

public boolean hasMoreTokens()
Tell whether the factory can create more tokens from the file.
Returns:
true if and only if the token being returned is EOF.

createToken

public Token createToken()
Create and return the next token of the file.
Returns:
The next token from the source.
